Currently Bitcoin & Ethereum are heavily congested which caused significantly delayed transactions for many users who sent using low or medium fee. We are adding an indicator that displays in real time if a blockchain is congested allowing you to make better decisions on fees.

It's interesting seeing a divergence in decentralized governance among Ethereum projects. There's an increase in projects adding a token for governance to their system (e.g. Compound) while others are purposely avoiding or limiting governance from the start (e.g. Liquity, Rai).
